introduction: Full-stack developer with 4 years of experience building scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Passionate about integrating AI-driven solutions and enhancing user experience through innovative technologies. Proven track record in collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop seamless, high-performance platforms. Experienced in building and optimizing AI-powered tools, such as intelligent chatbots using ChatGPT API, and leveraging cloud technologies for scalable solutions.

workExperience.title: Front-End Developer
description: Greenfield Development: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform from scratch using React and Golang, serving over 1,000 clients with a 96% satisfaction rate.
Legacy System Modernization: Migrated a legacy system to a Vue 3-based architecture, improving load times by 30% and enhancing stability.

AI Integration: Developed an intelligent Q&A chatbot leveraging the ChatGPT API, implemented real-time streaming to enhance user interactions, and scaled the system to support multiple departments, increasing overall productivity.

Leadership: Promoted from Junior to Mid-Level Developer within one year; mentored two junior developers, standardized coding practices, and introduced a Vue template scaffolding tool, reducing project setup time by 50%.

AWS Experience: Deployed containerized applications using AWS ECS and managed image repositories with AWS ECR, ensuring efficient deployment pipelines. Used AWS S3 for basic storage needs, such as handling static assets.

coursesAndInfo: Key Courses: Applied Investments, Data Analysis, Risk Management
Key Courses: Database basics, Mathematics and Algorithms, Financial Engineering

projects.title: Cloud IDE
description: Worked with a cross-functional team to design and implement scalable full-stack applications using Node.js and React.
Enhanced functionality by integrating preset plugins for intelligent code completion, folding, and debugging.
Automated deployment pipelines on AWS using CI/CD (GitHub Actions) and Docker, enabling seamless scalability.

projects.title: Linklogis Robot
description: Developed an intelligent chatbot leveraging ChatGPT's API to provide accurate and context-aware responses for internal use.
Implemented real-time streaming output for a seamless user experience during extended interactions.
Enhanced productivity with a widely-used internal tool, supporting multiple departments across the company.

projects.title: NFT Platform
description: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform for the company's anniversary, supporting the minting and transfer of digital assets.
Contributed to backend development in Golang, offering robust querying capabilities.
Deployed smart contracts on the blockchain using Solidity, adhering to the ERC-721 standard to securely issue and manage NFTs.
